description.value: Even magical means have a hard time prying information from you. You gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Nondetection]{Nondetection} as an innate occult spell once per day, which can only be cast on yourself and is automatically heightened to half your level rounded up.

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse
